teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я обучаю учеников любого уровня подготовки и являюсь сторонником личностно-ориентированного подхода, поэтому мои занятия построены согласно интересам, уровню языка и предпочтений ученика. Я предлагаю помощь с освоением грамматики, произношения и с речевой практикой, а также подготовкой к тестированию РКИ. 

I teach students of all levels and I am a supporter of a student-centered approach, so my classes are structured according to the interests, language level and preferences of the student. I offer help with grammar, pronunciation and speech practice, as well as preparation for testing RFL.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Для учеников базового уровня внимание акцентируется на основах языка и речевой практике. Материал занятий подбирается индивидуально для каждого ученика, в зависимости от его интересов. Для учеников высокого уровня подготовки возможны обсуждения различных тем, чтение и написание научно-популярных статей, текстов.

For students of the basic level, attention is focused on the basics of language and speech practice. The material of the lessons is selected individually for each student, depending on his interests. For advanced students there are more in-depth discussions of various subjects, reading and writing academic texts.

teacher_info.intro: I am a seasoned communications professional with more than 10 years of professional experience in the industry. Teaching English and Russian is my full-time job. I also conduct effective training sessions on cultural sensitivity and diversity; public speaking; mental processing, decision-making and interpersonal relations in translating or interpreting. My mission is to make sure that cross-cultural and cross-linguistic contacts between people lead to the best possible, fruitful results. I truly believe that language proficiency and sensitivity to cultural differences empowers people. I am also a member of American Northwest Translators and Interpreters Society.
teacher_info.introduction: I have always been passionate about teaching languages and learning about different cultures. That is why I worked for international companies based in the USA and UK. My teaching responsibilities included: • teaching Russian and English to customers • determining language schedule, assessing customers’ needs • providing cultural training to customers • developing a training program customized to the customers’ needs • providing monthly reports • consulting teachers on the choice of learning materials • helping top managers prepare conference speeches in Russian • providing training on Russian traditions, customs, etiquette, etc. The companies I have worked with include JPMC, Merck, Pepsi, Shell, BP, Alcoa, GlaxoSmithKline, Alcoa, AT Kearney, Ford, General Motors, AVON, H&M;, AGCO, Oshkosh, Microsoft, Nike, General Electric, etc. I have worked with people of different cultural backgrounds: American, British, Scottish, Greek, Spanish, Italian, Czech, Polish, Romanian, Serbian, Australian, Ukrainian, Iranian, Peruvian, Japanese, Chinese, Swedish, Finnish, German, French, etc. What I can offer you includes: - language skills assessment - choosing course program - teaching grammar and building up vocabulary - working on pronunciation - tracking your progress I would be happy to share my experience with you and support your language studies.
teacher_info.about_me: I am a seasoned communications professional with more than 10 years of professional experience in the industry. Teaching English and Russian is my full-time job. I also conduct effective training sessions on cultural sensitivity and diversity; public speaking; mental processing, decision-making and interpersonal relations in translating or interpreting. My mission is to make sure that cross-cultural and cross-linguistic contacts between people lead to the best possible, fruitful results. I truly believe that language proficiency and sensitivity to cultural differences empowers people. I am also a member of American Northwest Translators and Interpreters Society.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a very active and enthusiastic teacher. I follow these principles in my teaching: having enthusiasm and sharing it with students; learning about the students in the course; organizing each class thoroughly; and using a variety of teaching methods to present the material.  
I am not ‘fishing’ for my students but I give them fishing rods and teach them how to fish. Thus, I teach my students to teach themselves so that they would be able to recognize patterns in the language and know where to look for answers when they need help.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My philosophy of teaching asserts that students are entitled to quality instruction in an active and 
stimulating learning environment. I believe that effective teaching is comprised of 3 necessary 
elements. 
Firstly, a great teacher is passionate and enthusiastic about the subject they are teaching. 
Secondly, a great teacher exploits teaching experience of previous generations with all their 
successes and failures at the same time leaving some space for tackling tasks with a new and creative 
approach.
The last but probably the most important piece of effective teaching is creating a safe environment 
that is interactive and that promotes problem-solving and critical thinking.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for complete beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
•You will learn about the Russian alphabet, difference between lessons and sounds, practice pronouncing Russian sounds and learn about specific characteristics of Russian sounds and how different they are from 'same' sounds in other languages.
•You will learn about 10 vowels and 21 consonants as well as 2 signs. You will learn about palatalizing/non-palatalizing, stressed and unstressed vowels. You will also learn about voiced/voiceless, hard/soft consonants. Lesson materials a set of articulation exercises to help you pronounce 'difficult' sounds easier.
•You will learn about rules of reading Russian vowels: а, о, е, я, ё, ю. You will learn how to read stressed and unstressed vowels and how spelling is different from pronunciation.
•You will learn about Russian hard and soft consonants and how to pronounce them properly. You will also learn about important phonetic and orthographic rules. You will practice reading combinations of consonants.
•You will learn about Й phoneme, how it is different from И, and its pronunciation. Lesson materials cover hard and soft signs and their functions. A special attention is paid to 5 types of the most important intonation constructions.

An 3-minute extract with some explanations: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KLOhTAccMcE

pro_course_detail.title: Custom Executive / Professional Business English
pro_course_detail.description:
This is for you if you want a course tailored to your needs. This package is meant for busy business people who might not have the time to study on their own time.

I develop a customized and holistic program that would help you improve your command of English. You will practice giving presentations and participating in negotiations, writing memos and executive summaries. You will also learn about doing business in other countries, polish your pronunciations, and learn advanced English grammar. 

The course focuses on business vocabulary and topics used in the world of business, for instance, trade, finance, marketing, and international relations. More focus is placed on developing communication skills used in the workplace, on the language needed for typical business communication, such as presentations, negotiations, meetings, socializing, correspondence, and report writing. 

The main topics covered include risk management, financial control and funding, quality and standards, contracts, documents, corporate ethics, information systems and communication, outsourcing, strategic branding and partnering, crisis management, free trade and multinationals, takeovers and mergers, leadership and innovation, competition, advertising, building relationships, etc.

Every lesson includes all the materials you will need for each session (I prepare them for you in advance). The price also includes checking your homework (grammar, vocabulary assignments) and writing (press releases, corporate guidelines, financial reporting, formal invitations, executive summaries, mail shots and sales letters, procedures and instructions).

Please do not hesitate to contact me with your specific needs and requests. This Executive learning set includes comprehensive learning plan which will be customized based on your schedule, your personal and your business needs. The package price also includes all background work of the company to align all learning content to the individual company.

Hi! 
My name is Anastasia and I’m a teacher of three languages: English, Chinese and Russian as a foreign language. I have over ten years of experience in teaching that. I helped a lot of students to learn a foreign language and to improve their skills of communication and to start talking freely with confidence!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! 
My name is Anastasia and I’m a teacher of three languages: English, Chinese and Russian as a foreign language. I have over ten years of experience in teaching that. I helped a lot of students to learn a foreign language and to improve their skills of communication and to start talking freely with confidence!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
There are a lot of different techniques on how to learn another language. The technique which I prefer to use is communicative and it’s intended to help you learn a foreign language as quickly as possible and succeed in it! 
I believe that language learning should be accompanied by immersion in a foreign culture.
You will master the language faster and will be able to use it if you think like a native speaker. I will be glad to help you with all these tasks.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
A friendly atmosphere awaits you in my classes. I create the most comfortable conditions for you so that you can achieve your goals as quickly as possible.

What I want you to do already is to stop for a moment, close your eyes and imagine yourself speaking a confident, fluid foreign language - where are you, what are you using it for, how are people responding to you, how do you feel inside?
Now, let's keep that picture with you throughout the whole process of learning. See you in my lessons! Bye.

teacher_info.intro:
Привіт! Привет! Hi!
My name is Denis, I studied at Kyiv National Linguistic University (UA) where I got my both BA and MA in Linguistics and World Literature (with specialization in teaching). I used to work as a language teacher at Mathematician Lyceum in Kyiv and then spent almost 8 years in Greece where I also gave some classes in Russian and Ukrainian to Greek students (mostly of Slavic philology), and at the same time took my classes in Greek. Languages are not my hobby anymore. It is my profession and passion at the same time. I try to follow all developments in the world of teaching language methodologies and successfully use those methods during my classes, both offline and online.
teacher_info.introduction:
I have MA in linguistics and world literature and so I am confident that my strong educational background and personal experience in learning languages will make our classes easy but very efficient. I have experience teaching at all levels.

Based on my teaching experience, both offline and online, I started a new project/blog "Lingua Challenge". Even though I only accept online requests from students through italki, Lingua Challenge has the aim to become an additional resource for those learning Ukrainian or Russian, and also this blog will help me to share my personal experience in learning languages. Feel free to check - linguachallenge.com

P.S. "Lingua Challenge" is an informational, not for profit resource. I do not accept any requests for teaching there. My best recommendation is to use italki for that reason and if you follow the link on Lingua Challenge to my profile on italki (with my schedule and courses available) or to italki, you can get an additional bonus :).
teacher_info.about_me:
Привіт! Привет! Hi!
My name is Denis, I studied at Kyiv National Linguistic University (UA) where I got my both BA and MA in Linguistics and World Literature (with specialization in teaching). I used to work as a language teacher at Mathematician Lyceum in Kyiv and then spent almost 8 years in Greece where I also gave some classes in Russian and Ukrainian to Greek students (mostly of Slavic philology), and at the same time took my classes in Greek. Languages are not my hobby anymore. It is my profession and passion at the same time. I try to follow all developments in the world of teaching language methodologies and successfully use those methods during my classes, both offline and online.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
What to expect from the classes?
I do expect from my students a certain level of motivation. In return, you receive concrete steps on how to reach language goals and where/how to go from the "language level" you are now. I provide students with all the materials required. Usually, we have a core book that we cover step by step (also provided by me, but if you prefer hard copy - it can always be ordered at Amazon or eBay). There are also many additional materials taken from different sources which are of a great help for developing curtain language skills. The formula is the following: we cover material/theory and then practicing, practicing, practicing. In a different way but practicing​.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Language levels
There are two courses in languages I have here: Ukrainian (all levels) and Russian (all levels). This does not mean that every student gets the same set of language classes. It means that I will adapt the course based on your current knowledge.

Language +
This course is created for those who want to start language but would like to get guidance on where/how/when to start. During our meetings, I will share practical advice and help to adapt/organize the studying environment for a student. 
For the Advanced learners of Russian (Levels A2 +) I have also created a Podcast series called "Итак!"

Rescheduling less than 24 hours in advance/no-shows: not possible -full charge.
teacher_info.cancel_policy:
RESCHEDULING AND NO-SHOW POLICY:
Rescheduling more than 3 days in advance: No problem.
Rescheduling between 3 days and 24 hours in advance: acceptable but limited options.
Rescheduling less than 24 hours in advance: not possible. The student will be charged for the session. This also applies to no-shows (except if it's a no-show at the first appointment for a trial lesson).

teacher_info.about_teacher:

An meiner deutschen Universität und an der Uni in Russland habe ich Fachdidaktik studiert, deswegen kenne ich die Unterrichtsmethodik sehr gut, die für dein Deutschlernen effektiv wird.
Mein Motto ist: Übung macht den Meister, was auf Russisch bedeutet 'Практика делает совершенным'. Und ich bin davon überzeugt, dass du alle deine Ziele im Deutschlernen erreichen kannst.

RU: Я преподаю немецкий язык 3 года. Мой уровень подтвержден сертификатом TestDaf (C1). Я знаю как структурировать урок так, чтобы он был эффективным для тебя.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
DE: Im Unterricht verwende ich moderne Lehrbücher und vielfältige authentische Materialien., wie z.B. Zeitungen, Videos und Bilder. 
Im Fokus des Unterrichts steht die Erweiterung der Kommunikativen Kompetenzen und zwar: Sprechen, Hören, Schreiben und Lesen. 
Nach dem Gespräch mit dir erstelle ich einen individuellen Lehrplan, um dir zu helfen, deine Ziele mit Erfolg und Spaß zu erreichen.

teacher_info.intro: Меня зовут Сергей Грин и "Грин" - это действительно моя фамилия. Как "Зеленый" по-английски. Пришлось некоторое время пожить и поработать в США (в штатах Висконсин, Иллинойс). Вернуться снова в Украину и стать счастливым отцом своих детей... teacher_info.about_teacher: Мое первое образование - педагогическое. Сразу после окончания школы я окончил Государственный университет по специальности "Преподаватель истории и социальных наук". Всю свою жизнь мне было интересно делиться знаниями с теми, кто в них нуждался и кто просил о помощи, какого бы предмета это не касалось. Задолго до всемирного локдауна я с удовольствием для себя открыл преподавание иностранного языка онлайн и понял, что некоторым людям нравится общение и работа со мной. Свою ежедневную практику, таким образом, я превратил  сначала в хобби, а потом и в оплачиваемую работу. В 2021 году оформил свой опыт в официальную сертификацию. Теперь я сертифицированный преподаватель TESOL...
teacher_info.teaching_style: С интересом изучаю различные платформы и школы, использую различные материалы. Основной подход - практика, которой должно быть как можно больше и погружение в языковую среду. Мир - удивителен. Изучая его, всегда найдется что-то новое, что будет интересно узнать и о чем было бы интересно поговорить. Космос иногда кроется в ничтожных деталях. Нужно только научиться его видеть.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! 

My name is Alina! I was born and raised in the Caucasus, an absolutely stunning region in the south of Russia. I come from a multicultural family. This allowed me to grow up speaking both Russian and English. 

Throughout my life, I have lived in several countries including the USA, UK, Spain, Finland, and UAE. Five years ago I moved to pursue my bachelor's degree in The Netherlands. For the past few months, I have been traveling and learning Dutch through italki, which inspired me to become a teacher myself. 
 
I am a highly energetic individual and my lessons reflect that.
teacher_info.short_signature: I am here to create a fun learning environment for you!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! 

My name is Alina! I was born and raised in the Caucasus, an absolutely stunning region in the south of Russia. I come from a multicultural family. This allowed me to grow up speaking both Russian and English. 

Throughout my life, I have lived in several countries including the USA, UK, Spain, Finland, and UAE. Five years ago I moved to pursue my bachelor's degree in The Netherlands. For the past few months, I have been traveling and learning Dutch through italki, which inspired me to become a teacher myself. 
 
I am a highly energetic individual and my lessons reflect that.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I specialize in casual and professional conversations in both English and Russian. 

I have an Associate degree in English language and linguistics. I aim to use that knowledge to help you understand the language better. Moreover, I taught Russian to my fellow students at the university for two years.

As I have mentioned, I come from a diverse background. I have eight cousins and four nephews native to five different countries in which Russian or English are not primary languages. I practice the languages with them a lot by giving them fun assignments and topics to discuss. 

Grammar and vocabulary are important, however, my main goal is to make you confident in conversation.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I try to create an informal setting, in which you can practice your language skills without any pressure. Feel free to be at home; on a train or in a park. :) 

I am open to talking about a large variety of topics. My lessons are based on what you want and need.

My goal in these lessons is not to test your grammar skills, but to bring you to a level where you can keep up with a native speaker. Through engaging conversations and an interactive classroom, I can help you speak and understand the languages more fluently and prepare for upcoming travels. 

Let me tell you, EVERYONE speaks better in a foreign language when they speak about their passions without focusing on the language rules.

course_info.trial_description:
In the trial lesson, we will get to know each other and discuss your goals and expectation about practicing your English or Russian skills. After the small introduction, I will be asking you questions and I would like for you to do most of the talking. 

I want to use the lesson, to understand you language skills so we could plan on how I can best help you.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English-Intermediate
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson, we will first establish a comfortable baseline of your language skills. We will progressively build on it by switching between different topics to expand our grammar.

There will be no homework unless you ask for it. I want to allow you to speak as much as possible and ask me questions. Listening and speaking to a native speaker is one of the best ways to accelerate your language skills. 

I will provide you with some external materials, such as useful websites and PDFs, depending on your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian-Intermediate
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson, we will focus on your main concerns and frustrations when it comes to the complex Russian language. We will get to know each other in Russian and from there get into more advanced and interesting conversations. 

I will help you understand not only what is a correct grammatical way of building sentences, but how an actual native speaker would speak.

I have a great variety of external materials, that may be helpful for you outside of the classroom.

pro_course_detail.title: English-Interview Prep
pro_course_detail.description: In this class, we will discuss some basic questions you can expect during an academic or professional interview. We will go over the general ideas of how the interviews are executed and I will teach you the way you can present yourself in the best possible way.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian-Advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is for those who are nearly fluent in Russian but lacking practice. 

This will be an informal setting in which I will answer any of the questions (in Russian!:) ) that you might have about the language or the culture. 

I will also be asking you a million different things to see how far you vocabulary and grammar goes and maybe we will find some more things we could work on.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian-Elementary
pro_course_detail.description: These are lessons for those who are new to the Russian language. We will be covering some basic grammar rules and progressively moving onto more complex topics. This type of lesson will require some self study at home!

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! My name is Anastasia. 
I got my bachelor degree in teaching Chinese and English five years ago, and since then I’ve been teaching these languages as well as the Russian language to students from all over the world. 
Now I’m doing my Master’s degree in Linguistics so learning and teaching languages is my job, hobby and, more importantly, my true passion.
大家好！我叫Anastasia，您可以叫我阿夏。 我的母语是俄语。我很期待帮你们对我的国家、文化和语言熟悉一下。
5年前，我获得本科学历，我的专业是中英文老师。几年以来，我坚持给来自世界各地的学生教中文、英文和俄文。
现在我是硕士，我的研究方向是中文语言学。如你所见，语言是我的工作、我的爱好，是我的热爱！

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I believe that the best way to learn any language is to talk about what we love: traveling, cinema, books, science and so on - I’d love to discuss it with you. If you are a beginner, don’t be worried - I understand the problems and fears you may face. And, I am sure, we will find a way to boost your level.
我相信，学习如何语言，最好的办法是讨论你最喜欢的东西：旅游、电影、科学、运动等等 - 让我知道您喜欢谈什么。如果您是个初级学习者的话，别担心了，我们一定会找办法帮你快速进步。
teacher_info.teaching_style:
On my classes of Russian, English and Chinese languages, I prefer to use interactive methods: brainstorming, debates, games, etc. - these forms help my students get rid of the fear of speaking a foreign language and apply in practice their knowledge and skills. 
讲课的时候，我更喜欢使用互动教学法：头脑风暴，辩论，游戏等 ——这些教法帮助学生摆脱说外语的恐惧。此外，而且学生有机会在实践中应用他们的知识和技能。

course_info.trial_description:
We spend these 30 mins talking about your experience in learning your target language, your goals  and the technics and methods that would be more suitable for you. I'll gladly answer any your questions regarding the educational process. 
If we have any time left, we simply start studying:)

pro_course_detail.title: TRKI (Test of Russian as a Foreign Language)
pro_course_detail.description: The course suits for those who are about to take a TRKI (Test of Russian as a Foreign Language), A1-C2. On out first class, we discuss your goals and language aspects we will have to pay attention to.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description: If you have never met the Russian language before in your life, you should try this course: we start with the alphabet, common phases, gradually immerse you into the world of Russian grammar and enhance your vocabulary.

pro_course_detail.title: HSK (Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi) 1-5
pro_course_detail.description:
An intensive course which dedicated to Chinese Proficiency Test HSK. 
First, we work on each of the three/four parts of the exam separately, then I offer practice tests - as many as you are ready to take. 
All materials are provided.

pro_course_detail.title: English for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Если вы учили английский в школе на протяжении 10 лет, но, отдыхая заграницей,  все еще не уверены, что сказать официанту в ресторане, записывайтесь на данный курс для начинающих. Разберем английский по полочкам с самого основания.
如果你试着学英语花了好多年，但是仍然对你自己的英语觉得不好意思，那就预定我的课吧！从零级开始，我们慢慢打破砂锅问到底。
I will be glad to help any student who may need my help with English:)

pro_course_detail.title: Chinese for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Страшно начинать учить китайский с китайцами? Нужна железобетонная база китайского языка? В зависимости от ваших целей, в этом курсе мы изучаем основы иероглифики, отдельное внимание уделяем фонетике, учимся обсуждать по-китайски такие темы как "поход по магазинам, рассказ о себе и своей семье, как пройти в библиотеку" и многое другое. 
Let's start learning Chinese from the very beginning! Many years ago I was a beginner, too, so I understand the struggles and fears you may have. I hope my knowledge and experience will be helpful.

teacher_info.intro: Hi everyone! I'm a professional teacher of English and Russian with more than 3 years of experience. If you want to learn more about me go to https://www.facebook.com/Learn-Russian-with-Irina-647457498690028/

2012-current - Tutor of English and Russian 

2014-2015 - English Teacher at the Novosibirsk State University, Russia 

2014-2015 - Teacher of English and Russian at the Interlang Language School, Novosibirsk, Russia 

I create individualized lesson plans using authentic materials. I believe that in learning any language the prime focus should be on speaking, After all, nothing boosts your confidence like a nice and easy conversation in your target language. Being a native Russian speaker, I'll introduce you to modern and effective ways of acquiring this powerful and beautiful language. I also teach ESL (English as a Second Language). Learning English has been my passion since very early childhood. I've come a long way from a complete beginner to an advanced user of this language, so I can safely say I know how to make the learning process as effective as possible.

pro_course_detail.description: This course will give you a feel for the Russian language. We'll tap into the basic grammar, but the main focus will be on conversational skills. By the end of the course, you'll be able to have a simple conversation with a native speaker on a variety of topics.

pro_course_detail.title: Beginner English Course
pro_course_detail.description: In this course I will guide you through the basics of the English language and show you the fun and brilliance of it!

pro_course_detail.title: One-to-one English Lesson

teacher_info.intro: I was born in Ukraine. After leaving school, I decided to become a teacher. So, I entered the pedagogical institute. I learned a lot about different teaching methods and techniques. Than I worked at school, thus having the opportunity to put in practice the newly-learned material. Now I teach Russian and English. Languages have always fascinated me. When the possibility to learn new language comes, I just grab it. I really enjoy learning and teaching languages and are ready to share my experience with others.
teacher_info.about_me: I was born in Ukraine. After leaving school, I decided to become a teacher. So, I entered the pedagogical institute. I learned a lot about different teaching methods and techniques. Than I worked at school, thus having the opportunity to put in practice the newly-learned material. Now I teach Russian and English. Languages have always fascinated me. When the possibility to learn new language comes, I just grab it. I really enjoy learning and teaching languages and are ready to share my experience with others.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I prefer to use the communicative method as the main method in my classes. What is more, I constantly encourage my students to continue practising language outside our classes, looking for opportunities to interact with the language environment through speaking, reading, as well as independently enrich their vocabulary through self-study programs. I can find the individual approach to everyone depending on their goals and needs.
teacher_info.teaching_style: In my classes I constantly try to create situations for my students in which they would learn to cooperate and interact the way the individuals in society do. I teach my students to express their thoughts in foreign language using culturally accepted speaking patterns. Various visual aids (video, audio, illustrations), situational monologues and dialogues, help me to make learning process interesting, lively and useful for students.

course_info.trial_description:
In this introductory lesson we will get to know each other and discuss your goals of learning Russian.
You will learn some useful words and colloquial expressions.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian General Speaking Course
pro_course_detail.description:
It is suitable for children and adults, for entire beginners and for those who have a theoretical knowledge of the language and wish to become proficient in the spoken language. 
The student will have acquired the thoroughly practical knowledge of the Russian language, both written and spoken. Not only will he have a good grasp of the grammar, but he will also have at his command a store of useful words, colloquial expressions and idiomatic sentences, which will enable him to enjoy to the full his contacts with Russian-speaking people. At the same time, he will be able to understand and appreciate Russian literature.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Grammar Course
pro_course_detail.description: You will learn and understand how the language works and see Russian grammar in real context. This course will help you to reach a high level of competence.

pro_course_detail.title: Get Talking Russian
pro_course_detail.description: This course concentrates on speaking as the necessary step to reading and understanding anything written in the language.

pro_course_detail.title: TORFL Exam Preparation: A1-A2
pro_course_detail.description:
The Test of Russian as a Foreign Language (TORFL) is a standardised test supervised by the Russian Ministry of Education and Science.

The lessons use materials developed by leading universities in Russia, designed to prepare for the TORFL exams, as well as a special learning platform, created by the publishing house "Zlatoust", the leading publishing house in the field of Russian as a foreign language. You can choose between intensive and long-term training depending on your needs.

Это творческие работы, много практики и индивидуальное расписание для каждого ученика под вашу цель, чтобы добиться хороших результатов. Я буду давать вам то, что позволит больше использовать язык, расширять ваш словарный запас и т.д. Мы подберём удобное для вас время и начнём этот путь вместе!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
На моих уроках мы сможете лучше понимать язык и использовать его
А именно:
- разговорная практика ( я выбираю разные способы, а именно импровизация, пересказ и другие)
- активное и пассивное слушание ( подбор аудио-подкастов и др. материалов для расширения вашего кругозора)
- чтение интересных статей, не просто сухой информации, а чего-то более глубокого и интересного именно вам
- грамматика необходимая для закрепления правил
- мы будем писать тексты или рассказы и т.п., это нужно для развития письма
- творческие работы ( сочинения, пересказы, видео и т.д)
Вам будет интересно учиться и я дам всю необходимую мотивацию для вашей цели

course_info.trial_description:
Чешский пробный урок: На пробном уроке мы познакомимся, обсудим намеченную цель, наше расписание, поймём от чего отталкиваться и как это сделать, чтобы для вас это было наиболее эффективно.
Ruská zkušební lekce: Ve zkušební lekci se navzájem seznámíme, probereme zamýšlený cíl, náš harmonogram, pochopíme, od čeho začít a jak to udělat, aby to pro vás bylo co nejefektivnější.

pro_course_detail.description:
Уроки для тех кому важно научиться основам чешского языка, а именно:
-  умение воспринимать на слух
- словарный запас
- базовая грамматика
- разговорная практика и др.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language - speaking. Ruský jazyk - mluvení
pro_course_detail.description:
We will speak Russian, learn to use new words and rules. Suitable for both those who already speak a little Russian and those who want to develop it. This applies to the levels of Russian proficiency - B1-C2.
Budeme mluvit rusky, naučíme se používat nová slova a pravidla. To je vhodné pro ty lidi, kteří již mluví trochu rusky, a pro ty, kteří se v tom chtějí dále rozvíjet.To platí pro úrovně znalostí ruštiny - B1-C2
